attributes.review: I wanted to support my beloved president. Sadly there must be a mishaps in the programming because all it is broadcasting is how to vote for trump again.
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: Constantly asking me for location, money, spamming me with promises of “free stuff if you donate” Trump smells of desperation and he’s texting more than my ex
attributes.title: Nagging

attributes.review: This app is bad I wanted to get into politics and see what the Orange was doing but the app doesn’t really help me do that 🤧 I wanted to see that 🍊 jiggle
attributes.title: It is what it is 😎

attributes.review: This is the worst possible app you could ever download. It’s pointless and a terrible app overall. DO NOT I repeat DO NOT download this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: The app took months to download and it just glitched out every time I opened it.
attributes.title: Terrible president and app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and someone immediately showed up at my door with a MAGA hat and KO’d me right on my porch!
attributes.title: beware! steals your information!

attributes.review: It burned down my house and my phone exploded from this 😔🤚🏻 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: ✨terrible✨

attributes.review: I was on this app and it sent me to the black market straight to buy cut off heads . For all u trump supporters. Stop ❤️
attributes.title: Never again

attributes.review: tried to put in my phone number but for some reason it logged me out and after 20 so tries i finally got in but my phone started glitching, so now i have to go fix my phone. thanks for nothing
attributes.title: this app is terrible

attributes.review: Trump is by far the most manipulative, ignorant, sexist, racist, xenophobic, homophobic president we’ve ever had. The fact that America actually voted for him just disappoints me how stupid people are. MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! VOTE TRUMP OUT OF OFFICE!
attributes.title: Horrible
